channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: The Late Debate
channel.desc: Regional political review and discussion programme for the London area, in which different local MPs and politicians discuss current affairs and political issues in the area.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: The Assembly
channel.desc: Gary Lineker faces a grilling from a collective of autistic and learning-disabled interviewers where no question is off the table and no subject out of bounds.
